parameters.name: dataSourceName
parameters.description: The name of the data source. Valid values: -search: search for data. -not_search: do not search for data.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the configuration before the modification.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The type of the algorithm. Valid values:

*   pop: a popularity model.
*   cp: a category prediction model.
*   hot: a top search model.
*   hint: a hint model.
*   suggest: a drop-down suggestions model.
